front.title: Operational Security Requirements for IP Network Infrastructure: Advanced Requirements

abstract.t: This document defines a list of operational security requirements for the infrastructure of large IP networks (such as routers and switches). The goals of this document are to serve as a collection of ideas for security features that would improve operational security and to assist consumers of network equipment in communicating their security requirements to vendors. The requirements in this document are NOT considered to be best current practice (BCP). Comments to:
